# Stone Construct (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** S, M (granite and 250 gp worth of diamond dust sprinkled on the construct)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Construct touched

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC)Â­, pg. 116

The construct you touch gains resistance to blows, cuts, stabs, and slashes. The subject gains damage reduction 10/[[Adamantine|adamantine]]. Once the spell has prevented a total of 10 points of damage per caster level you possess (maximum 150 points), it is discharged.
